MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels affecting properties in Croft Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.15am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Croft Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.56am on Friday 23rd October 2020.
